job.title: Sr. Software Engineer (Java/Hibernate/Spring) REMOTE - Ad Tech!
job.description: If you are a Senior Software Engineer with 3-5 years of experience in (Java/Hibernate/Spring), please read on! Headquartered in the heart of San Francisco, we are a REMOTE Ad-Tech company working with cutting-edge technologies to transform B2B Marketing. Our patented technology has been servicing World-Class customers nationwide for over 5 years! We are rapidly growing our talented team of Developers and are searching for a Senior Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience designing, architecting and building RESTful web services and applications using Java, Spring, Hibernate. If you are seeking an exciting, challenging opportunity with exponential growth opportunities -- please apply TODAY! Top Reasons to Work with Us Fully remote Patented technology World Class Customers such as Zoom, Okta Growth opportunities What You Will Be Doing Design, architect and develop RESTful web services and applications using Java Database development Technical design and development of new features What You Need for this Position 3-5+ years of experience in: Java Spring Hibernate Redis RabbitMQ SQL ElasticSearch Linux CI/CD Azure Nice To Have React.js jQuery So, if you are a Senior Software Engineer with 3-5 years of experience in (Java/Hibernate/Spring), please apply today! Email Your Resume In Word To Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also: Danielle.McIntire@CyberCoders.com Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DM12-1649139 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.*** Danielle McIntire - Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
